sentences.en: A wooden stake was driven firmly into the ground.
sentences.cn: 木桩被牢牢钉进土地里.

sentences.en: At stake are more than 20,000 jobs in Britain's aerospace sector.
sentences.cn: 英国航天部门2万多人面临失业的危险。

sentences.en: At stake is the success or failure of world trade talks.
sentences.cn: 世界贸易谈判正处于成败的重要关头。

sentences.en: Competition has been fierce to win a stake in Skoda.
sentences.cn: 争夺斯柯达股份的竞争极为激烈。

sentences.en: For a dollar stake, you can win up to $1,000,000.
sentences.cn: 押一美元赌注，最多可赢一百万美元。

sentences.en: General Motors acquired a 50% stake in Saab for about $400m.
sentences.cn: 通用汽车公司以大约4亿美元的价格购得了萨博汽车公司50%的股份。

sentences.en: He set the stake in the ground.
sentences.cn: 他将桩子竖在地上.

sentences.en: He was burned at the stake for heresy.
sentences.cn: 他因为信奉异端思想而以火刑处死。

sentences.en: Heretics were burned at the stake.
sentences.cn: 持异端者被处以火刑.

sentences.en: His stake has been held in escrow since the start of the year.
sentences.cn: 从年初开始，他的股份已经交由第三方暂时保管。

sentences.en: Joan of Arc was burnt at the stake .
sentences.cn: 圣女贞德被处以火刑。

sentences.en: National pride is at stake in next week’s game against England.
sentences.cn: 下星期对英格兰队的比赛关乎民族尊严。

sentences.en: People don't just knock one another off like this unless there's big money at stake.
sentences.cn: 如果不是为了冒险赚大钱，人们不会像这样彼此残杀。

sentences.en: tent stakes
sentences.cn: 帐篷桩

sentences.en: The life of the sick man is at stake.
sentences.cn: 病人的生命在危急中.

sentences.en: The tension was naturally high for a game with so much at stake.
sentences.cn: 对于一场成败攸关的比赛来说气氛自然非常紧张。

sentences.en: They have to win the contract – thousands of jobs are at stake.
sentences.cn: 他们必须拿下这份合同，这关系到数千个工作岗位。

sentences.en: They planted a stake in the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们在地上栽了一根木桩.

sentences.en: they'd staked out Culley's flat for half a day.
sentences.cn: 他们暗中监视卡勒的公寓已经有半天了。

sentences.en: We are lagging behind in the childcare stakes.
sentences.cn: 我们在儿童保育竞赛中正落在后面。

sentences.en: Witches used to be burned at the stake.
sentences.cn: 巫婆过去要被处以火刑.

sentences.en: Young people don’t feel they have a stake in the country’s future.
sentences.cn: 年轻人觉得自己与国家的未来没有关系。

phrases.tran_cn: 为（信仰、观点或人）不惜一切
在...上打赌；把赌注押在...上面
为某人取得某物而提供金钱(或援助)，资助某人取得某物
(非正式)连续不断地暗中监视

trans.tran_cn: 桩，刑柱，股份，（在公司、计划等中的）重大利益
trans.tran_en: money that you risk as the result of a horse race, card game etc

trans.tran_cn: 资助，支持；系…于桩上；把…押下打赌
trans.tran_en: to risk losing something that is valuable or important to you on the result of something

trans.tran_cn: 用桩支撑，以…下注[打赌]，用桩区分，界分
trans.tran_en: to risk losing something that is valuable or important to you on the result of something
